title: Kermit Lynch Reds
description:
Join us on November 6th from 4-7 PM at Whispering Vine’s South Creek location for a special Kermit Lynch tasting! For just $30, savor a 3oz pour of four curated reds:

  • Catherine & Pierre Breton 2016 – $49.99
  • Megaphone Rouge 2021 – $19.99
  • Clos La Coutale Cahors 2021 – $19.99
  • Kermit Lynch Côtes du Rhône 2021 – $17.99

Buy any bottle from the tasting, and your tasting is free! Come experience these exceptional French wines with us!
